high_descs: Make a right and walk across the room to the desk next to the floral couch.
Pick up the smartphone on the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a smartphone, turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room to the brown desk.
Pick up the cell phone from the desk.
Walk slightly to the left and stand in front of the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a cell phone by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and head to the desk in front of you
Pick up the white cell phone that is sitting on the desk
Take a step to the left and continue to face the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a phone by lamp light
